content: top of the beginning single_crochet with a slip_stitch do no t end off stitch count 16ex-fpdc 64sc 19 roun d 1 3 ch1 this does not count as a st 1sc in the same st 1sc in each of the next 79sts join to the beginning single_crochet with a slip_stitch do not end off stitch count 80sc round 1 4 slip_stitch into the next 2sts ch2 this counts as the 1st double_crochet 8dc in the same st *sk2sts 1sc in each of the next 15sts sk2sts 9dc in the next st * repeat from * to * 3 more times omitting the last corner join to the top of the beginning ch2 with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 15sc per side 9dc in each corner 20 roun d 1 5 join in the 1st double_crochet of any corner 9dc ch2 decrease over the next 2sts this counts as the 1st dc3tog ch3 dc3tog over the next 3sts ch3 twice *sk2st s 1sc in each of the next 11sts sk2sts ch3 dc3tog over the next 3sts 3 times ch3 * repeat from * to * 3 more times omitting the last corner ch3 join to the top of the beginning dc3tog with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 11sc per side 3dc3tog 4 ch3-spaces in each corner rou n d 1 6 note you may need to hook up for this surface slip_stitch round join around the post of the 1st double_crochet of any corner 9dc in round 14 surface slip_stitch along each corner double_crochet and each single_crochet until you have worked all the way around fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 96 surface sl sts 21 roun d 1 7 note if you hooked up for the surface sl sts make sure you go back to your normal working hook join w ith a standing fpdc around the centre dc3tog of any corner ch1 1fpdc around the top of the same dc3tog *4hdc in the next ch3-space 1fpdc around the top of the next dc3tog 2hdc in the next ch3-space 1hdc i n each of the next 11sts 2hdc in the next ch3-space 1fpdc around the top of the next dc3tog 4hdc in the next ch3-space 1fpdc ch1 1fpdc around the top of the centre dc3tog * repeat from * to * 3 more times omitting the last corner join to the top of the beginning fpdc with a slip_stitch do no t end off stitch count 2fpdc 23hdc per side 1fpdc ch1 1fpdc in each corner 22 roun d 1 8 slip_stitch into the corner space ch2 this counts as the 1st half_double_crochet 1hdc ch1 2hdc in the same space *skip the hidden st 1hdc in each of the next 26sts 2hdc ch1 2hdc in the corner space * repeat from * to * 3 more times omitting the last corner join to the top of the beginning ch2 with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 26hdc per side 2hdc ch1 2hdc
